data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting.
data.news_body:
1.Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2024 along with Auditors Report
2. Board of directors have recommended a dividend of Rs.18/- per Share of Rs.10/- each ( 180% on the face value of Rs.10/- each) for the financial year ended March 31, 2024, subject to the approval of shareholders in the upcoming Annual General Meeting.

3. Re-appointment of Sri.B.Vijayakumar (DIN:00015583) as Executive Chairman for a further period of 5 years effective from January 01, 2025,
4.Sri.Dinesh Kumar J Din: (10586227) as an Additional and Independent Director with effect from September 01, 2024 for a tenure of 5 years.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2023.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are forwarding herewith the Standalone & Consolidated audited financial results for the quarter / six months ended September 30, 2023 along with Auditors Report which were reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on today i.e. the October 30, 2023.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For June 2023 Quarter
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR Regulations, the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 is attached

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Saturday, April, 29, 2023 had inter-alia considered and approved the following: 1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations we are enclosing herewith the Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 along with Auditors Report and a declaration under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI Listing Regulations are enclosed herewith. Further note that the statutory auditors of the Company have expressed an unqualified audit opinion in this regard.2. Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, the board of directors have recommended a dividend of Rs.16/- per Share of Rs.10/- each (160% on the face value of Rs.10/- each) for the financial year ended March 31, 2023, subject to the approval of shareholders in the upcoming Annual General Meeting.This is to inform that the Board meeting commenced at 3.00 P.M and concluded at 6.00 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on Saturday, April, 29, 2023 had inter-alia considered and approved the following:

1. Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations we are enclosing herewith the Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 along with Auditors Report and a declaration under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI Listing Regulations are enclosed herewith. Further note that the statutory auditors of the Company have expressed an unqualified audit opinion in this regard.

2. Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, the board of directors have recommended a dividend of Rs.16/- per Share of Rs.10/- each (160% on the face value of Rs.10/- each) for the financial year ended March 31, 2023, subject to the approval of shareholders in the upcoming Annual General Meeting.

This is to inform that the Board meeting commenced at 3.00 P.M and concluded at 6.00 P.M.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are forwarding herewith the Standalone & Consolidated audited financial results for the quarter / nine months ended 31st December, 2022 along with Auditors Report which were reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on today i.e. the 28th January, 2023

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations we are enclosing herewith the Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 along with Auditors Report and a declaration under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI Listing Regulations are enclosed herewith. Further note that the statutory auditors of the Company have expressed an unqualified audit opinion in this regard.2. Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, the board of directors have recommended a dividend of Rs.15/- per Share of Rs.10/- each (150% on the face value of Rs.10/- each) for the financial year ended March 31, 2022, subject to the approval of shareholders in the upcoming Annual General Meeting.3. Recommended, the re-appointment of M/s. Suri & Co, Chartered Accountants, (Firm Registration No. 004283S) as the statutory auditors of the Company

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting.
data.news_body:
1. we are enclosing herewith the Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 along with Auditors Report and a declaration under Regulation 33(3)(d) of SEBI Listing Regulations are enclosed herewith. data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31.03.2021
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations we are enclosing herewith Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 along with Auditors Report. Further note that the statutory auditors of the Company have expressed an unqualified audit opinion in this regard.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
1.Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Listing Regulations, the Audited Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021 along with Auditors Report.
2.Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations, the board of directors have recommended a dividend of Rs.10/- per Share for the financial year ended March 31, 2021, subject to the approval of shareholders in the upcoming Annual General Meeting.
3.Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with para A of Part A of Schedule III of LODR, the resignation of Sri.V.Rajvirdhan has taken on record.
4.The Board on recommendation of NRC Committee for appointment of Sri.Rajiv Parthasarathy Din: (02495329) as an Additional Director with effect from June, 10, 2021. A brief detail of the appointment enclosed as herewith.
This is to inform that the Board meeting commenced at 2.30 P.M and concluded at 5.40 P.M.
